Title: ELSA-2020-5746:  edk2 security update (IMPORTANT)
Description:
[1:1.3.1-1.el7]
- Updates for OVMF/AAVMF Version 1.3.1 to include:

* Fri May 01 2020 Aaron Young <aaron.young@oracle.com>
- Create new 1.3.1 release for OL7

* Wed Feb 05 2020 Aaron Young <aaron.young@oracle.com>
- Create new 1.3 release for OL7 which includes the following fixed CVEs:
  {CVE-2018-12182} {CVE-2019-13224} {CVE-2019-13225} {CVE-2019-14553}

* Fri May 17 2019 Aaron Young <aaron.young@oracle.com>
- Create new 1.2 release for OL7 which includes the following fixed CVEs:
  {CVE-2017-5715} {CVE-2017-5731} {CVE-2017-5732} {CVE-2017-5733} {CVE-2017-5734} {CVE-2017-5735} {CVE-2017-5753} {CVE-2018-12178} {CVE-2018-12180} {CVE-2018-12181} {CVE-2018-3630}

Criterions.Comment: OVMF is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
